attributes.action: Lower fares on public transport for adults
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price to use public transport for adults is obscene. I thought we were supposed to be becoming an eco country so why is the government discouraging adults from using the transport because of their ridiculously overpriced fare. If you feel the same way then enter your signature and help get our voice's heard.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
